item.title: National conference on application of artificial intelligence in agriculture at UAS Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[The University of Agricultural Sciences (UAS), Raichur, is in collaboration with University of Agricultural Sciences, Bengaluru, ISEE, South Zone-Karnataka Chapter, Bengaluru, ICAR-ATARI Hyderabad and Bengaluru, organising a two-day national conference on Application of Artificial Intelligence (AI) through extension services for sustainable development in agriculture and allied sectors from Thursday on its campus in Raichur.
Deputy Director-General of Agriculture Extension, ICAR, New Delhi, U.S...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: Excise officials raid house in Raichur, seize 650 litres of illegal liquor, cash
item.description:
<![CDATA[RAICHUR: Excise officials conducted a raid at a house at Korwar Oni on Gadwal Road here and seized 650 litres of illegal liquor and CH powder. The house belongs to one Gajji Veeresh.
During the raid, the Excise officials found 630 litres of illicit liquor and Rs 22,520 in cash which were seized. They have also registered a case against Gajji Veeresh and his wife Urukundamma.
Recently, the Excise officials had raided Veereshâ€™s house and seized illict liquor. A case had also been registered agai...]]>

item.title: Another lactating mother dies in Raichur; BJP demands accountability
item.description:
<![CDATA[1
2
Raichur: Saraswati, 24, passed away at Raichur Institute of Medical Sciences (RIMS) on Sunday, three days after delivering her baby.The deceased, who hailed from Haddinal in Devdurg taluk, underwent a C-section at RIMS on January 2 to deliver her fourth child, a son. Post-delivery, she was admitted to the ICU for hypertension treatment. According to Dr Bhaskar, medical superintendent at RIMS, she did not respond to treatment and succumbed on Sunday.The district has witnessed concerning num...]]>
item.author: Tnn
